0.text: Innate: Whenever a nearby enemy dies, Trundle  heals himself for  1.8% − 5.5% (based on level) of their maximum health.
Active: Trundle's next basic attack within 7 seconds has an  uncancellable windup, deals bonus physical damage and  slows the target by 75% for 0.1 seconds.

1.text: After using the empowered attack, Trundle gains  bonus attack damage for 5 seconds and reduces the target's attack damage by half that amount for the same duration.

2.text: Chomp  resets Trundle's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Trundle coats the target location in ice for 8 seconds. While he is within the area, he gains  bonus attack speed,  bonus movement speed, and 25% increased  healing from all sources.

1.text: Frozen Domain will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Trundle erects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, which  knocks back units hit to 225 units from its center. The pillar acts as terrain and  slows nearby enemies.

Active: Trundle drains the life force out of the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  healing himself for the same amount. He also steals 40% of their current  armor and  magic resistance, and increases in size by 18% while reducing the target's size by 9.9%.
Half of the total damage and stealing are applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has  died.

0.content: 20 / 27.5 / 35% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

1.content: 10 / 13.75 / 17.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

2.content: 2.5 / 3.4375 / 4.375% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

1.text: The armor and magic resistance will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% / 1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% armor penetration, and 3% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for 81.25% base AD (+ ( 3.9% /  1.95%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Colossus: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of bonus health.
Unique – Cleave: Basic attacks on-hit deal ( 4 / 3) (+ ( 1.5% / 1.125%) maximum health) bonus physical damage to the target and ( 40 / 30) (+ ( 3% / 2.25%) maximum health) physical damage to other enemies in a cone in the direction of the target.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – COLOSSUS: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of bonus health.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Trundle erects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, which  knocks back units hit to 225 units from its center. The pillar acts as terrain and  slows nearby enemies.

origin: 20 / 27.5 / 35% (+ 2% per 100 ap) of the target's maximum health
st_flatStats0.concerningText:
Active: Trundle drains the life force out of the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  healing himself for the same amount. He also steals 40% of their current  armor and  magic resistance, and increases in size by 18% while reducing the target's size by 9.9%.
Half of the total damage and stealing are applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has  died.

origin: 10 / 13.75 / 17.5% (+ 1% per 100 ap) of the target's maximum health
st_flatStats1.concerningText:
Active: Trundle drains the life force out of the target enemy champion, dealing magic damage and  healing himself for the same amount. He also steals 40% of their current  armor and  magic resistance, and increases in size by 18% while reducing the target's size by 9.9%.
Half of the total damage and stealing are applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has  died.
After using the empowered attack, Trundle gains  bonus attack damage for 5 seconds and reduces the target's attack damage by half that amount for the same duration.
